name: Golf Mania
description:
Golf Mania features over 90 holes of golfing mayhem that is easy to learn but tough to master.

With single and multiplayer gaming on classic grass courses and modern courses built upon incredible gravity defying glass towers, Golf Mania offers hours of gameplay for the whole family.

• Ingenious Putting Challenge
90 incredible holes set across 10 amazing courses
• Varied Course Elements
Sand traps, water hazards, ice, animated obstacles and more
• Multiplayer Gaming
Challenge family and friends to a round of golf
• Unlockable Rewards and Secrets
Unlock new courses and numerous ball variations



Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service and User Agreement. This item has been sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America.
